title: Option 1 Swap the Root View Controller Good
There are benefits to switching the root view controller, although the transition options are limited to those supported by
UIViewAnimationOptions
c
, so depending on how you wish to transition between flows might mean you have to implement a custom transition - which can be cumbersome.

title: You also have to set the frame of the Main view before you transition back to it, as you’re instantiating it for the first time.
